response.name: Margaret Thatcher: Policies of the Thatcher Premiership
response.snippet: Margaret Thatcher led a government that set out to take a sledgehammer to the post-war consensus and therefore drove through a large number of radical policy proposals, helped by healthy parliamentary majorities. Here are some of the most high profile policies during the Thatcher premiership. Economic Policy - Monetarism & Dealing with a Recession
